{{velocity wiki="true"}} #set($prefsdoc = $xwiki.getDocument("MailArchivePrefs.GlobalParameters")) #set($prefs = $prefsdoc.getObject("MailArchiveCode.AdminClass")) {{html wiki="true"}}
#set($prop=$xwiki.getPropertyClassFromName("MailArchiveCode.AdminClass_user"))
It is recommended to create a specific user for the Mail Archive, with edit rights on MailArchive and MailArchiveCode spaces, and to give only read rights to other users to these spaces.
$prefsdoc.display($prop.getName(), 'edit')
#set($prop=$xwiki.getPropertyClassFromName("MailArchiveCode.AdminClass_defaulthomeview"))
"Timeline" option is meaningful only if "timeline" property is set below.
$prefsdoc.display($prop.getName(), 'edit')
#set($prop=$xwiki.getPropertyClassFromName('MailArchiveCode.AdminClass_defaulttopicsview'))
$prefsdoc.display($prop.getName(), 'edit')
#set($prop=$xwiki.getPropertyClassFromName('MailArchiveCode.AdminClass_mailsopeningmode'))
Affects the way mails are displayed when clicked from a Topic view.
$prefsdoc.display($prop.getName(), 'edit')
#set($prop=$xwiki.getPropertyClassFromName('MailArchiveCode.AdminClass_excelexport'))
#if (!$xwiki.exists('Macros.AddExcelExportToLivetableMacro')) You need to install [[the export to Excel macro>>http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/LiveTableExcelExport+Macro]] to use this feature.
#else
$prefsdoc.display($prop.getName(), $mode) Add 'export to Excel' link to the Mail Archive livetables
#end
#set($prop=$xwiki.getPropertyClassFromName('MailArchiveCode.AdminClass_ratings'))
#if (!$xwiki.exists('XWiki.Ratings') || !$xwiki.ratings) You need to install Ratings Plugin and Ratings Applications to use this feature.
#else
$prefsdoc.display($prop.getName(), $mode) Show ratings in Topics and Mails views.
#end
#set($prop=$xwiki.getPropertyClassFromName('MailArchiveCode.AdminClass_timeline'))
The MailArchive Timeline shows bands for last topics in a timeline. Uses a [[Simile widget>>http://www.simile-widgets.org/timeline/]]. Timeline data is generated and cached after each loading session (if any mail was loaded). Can slightly slow down loading sessions.
$prefsdoc.display($prop.getName(), 'edit') Compute timeline data when new mails are loaded, and add option for timeline view in Mail Archive homepage
#set($prop=$xwiki.getPropertyClassFromName('MailArchiveCode.AdminClass_timelinemaxload'))
A number in range [1..500]. Large values show more history in timeline but can lead to big computation time and resources usage on server. Default is 100.
$prefsdoc.display($prop.getName(), 'edit')
#set($prop=$xwiki.getPropertyClassFromName('MailArchiveCode.AdminClass_matchwikiprofiles'))
$prefsdoc.display($prop.getName(), 'edit') Match wiki profiles using email addresses of authors, and set "created by", "updated by" fields accordingly in created wiki pages.
#if($hasEdit) #end
{{/html}} {{/velocity}}
